name: The Last of Us: American Dreams: Issue 3
summary:
"The Last of Us: American Dreams Issue #3" is the third of four issues in The Last of Us: American Dreams. It was released on June 26, 2013.

Fleeing a mall turned war zone, Ellie and Riley find themselves caught between the military and the Fireflies—and a nest of infected! Co-written by Naughty Dog Games art director Neil Druckmann! Essential chapter of the anticipated game!
info:
